attributes.action: Stand against Racism at Ukraine border
attributes.additional_details: Racism is simply unacceptable. Don’t sweep it under the carpet
attributes.background: Make noise and let all know that the treatment of Africans and african students seeking to leave Ukraine and facing the same danger as the Ukrainians. The UK government needs to make it clear that they are not in support of the racism. It is appalling.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about reports of racism at the Poland-Ukraine border, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.
